About the Competition

âœ¨

Our Legacy

Sikkim Rising Star is the premier talent hunt competition in Sikkim, established in 2018. Our mission is to discover and nurture exceptional talents across various performing arts disciplines.

Over the years, we have launched numerous successful careers and provided a platform for artists to showcase their abilities to a wider audience.

  • Continuous Growth â€“ Expanding reach every season

Competition Categories

Singing

Showcase your vocal talent across various genres

  • Solo Performance
  • Duet
  • Group Performance

Dancing

Express yourself through traditional and modern dance forms

  • Classical
  • Contemporary
  • Folk Dance

Rap

Deliver powerful lyrics and rhythms with style

  • Freestyle
  • Original Composition
  • Battle Rap

Beatbox

Create beats and rhythms using only your voice

  • Solo Beatboxing
  • Loop Station
  • Collaboration

Musical Instrument

Demonstrate your instrumental prowess

  • Solo Instrumental
  • Band Performance
  • Fusion

Open Talent

Showcase any unique skill or performance art

  • Comedy
  • Magic
  • Variety Acts

How It Works

Registration Process

Fill out the registration form and submit required details

  • Fill out the registration form
  • Provide required details
  • Submit before the deadline
  • Receive confirmation

Talent Hunt & Auditions

Open for all talent categories with online and offline auditions

  • Open for all talent categories
  • Online and offline auditions
  • Judges evaluate creativity and skill
  • Shortlisted participants proceed

Live Performances & Competition

Perform on a grand stage and compete through multiple rounds

  • Perform on a grand stage
  • Multiple competition rounds
  • Special performances and guest judges
  • Audience and judges decide winners

Recognition & Opportunities

Gain rewards, exposure, and career-building opportunities

  • Trophies, cash prizes, and certificates
  • Media exposure and promotions
  • Industry collaborations and brand deals
  • Future performance opportunities
